item.description:
*FIRST EVENT FOR SPRING!*

Come join us this Friday night at one of Boston's best lounges, Caprice! This two-level lounge spins a variety of music including house, hip-hop and international hits in a lively, Euro-inspired atmosphere. A fun place to meet new people and to get your groove on! New and current members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 9pm in the bar area at Rockbottom restaurant (115 Stuart St, near Tremont St corner). We will head over to Caprice around 10:00pm to beat the lines. If you plan to meet us at Caprice, be sure to get there early (close to 10pm) as you may have to fight lines later. Cover: Don't expect one, unless we go to Underbar....

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

Please dress appropriately as this is an upscale venue. If traveling by T, Boylston the closest T stop on the green line.

Hope to see you there! Charlie
item.how_to_find_us: My picture is on the site. Call my cell if you have questions or trouble finding the group.
item.why: Our meetup group is one of the largest in Boston because people have a great time meeting new people and enjoying the Boston Nightlife!

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Get out of the house and see you @ Caprice! This Friday, Apr 4th!
